raw_query: New valuation request: Sarah Anderson, 47 Oak Road, M20 2QR, 3-bed semi. Phone: 07700111001. Wants to know value before deciding to sell.
Door knock result: 15 Elm Street, M20 3AB. Homeowner James Patterson answered. Interested in valuation. Booked for Thursday 2pm.
Rightmove enquiry: Michael Brown interested in 47 Oak Road, M20 2QR. Message: 'Cash buyer, chain free, available for viewings anytime this week.'
Zoopla enquiry: First time buyer Sophie Turner asking about 22 Maple Avenue. Has mortgage approved. Wants evening viewing.
New buyer registration: Dr Aisha Patel. Budget £275k. Looking for 2-3 bed near hospital. Needs financial qualification check.
Valuation appointment tomorrow: 9 Mill Road, M20 1ST. Prepare CMA and marketing proposal for Dr Priya Sharma.
Generate CMA report for 5 Willow Walk, M20 7KL. 5-bed detached, expecting £500k+. Include premium comparables.
Vendor asking: 'What's my property worth?' Address: 7 Beech Grove, M20 8LK. 3-bed detached, extended 2022, solar panels.
Vendor objection at valuation: 'Your fee is too high at 1.5%. Online agents charge 0.5%.' Need response strategy.
Valuation completed yesterday: 66 Victoria Road. Vendor Julie Pearson didn't sign. Reason: needs to discuss with ex-husband. Schedule follow-up.
INSTRUCTION SIGNED: 47 Oak Road, M20 2QR. Vendor: Sarah Anderson. Fee: 1.2%. Sole agency 16 weeks. Initiate full onboarding.
Verify EPC status for new instruction: 15 Elm Street, M20 3AB. Check if valid and retrieve certificate details.
Run AML checks for new vendor: William Crawford, The Old Barn, Rural Lane, M23 9XY. ID documents uploaded to system.
Generate property description for: 23 Valley Drive, M20 5AB. 2-bed flat, help-to-buy eligible, new build, balcony. Target: first-time buyers.
Book professional photography for Plot 7 Oakwood Gardens. New build, 4-bed detached. Developer wants launch ASAP.
Property launch checklist: 9 Mill Road, M20 1ST. Verify all materials ready. EPC valid. Photos approved. Description compliant. Schedule portal upload.
Upload property to all portals: 7 Beech Grove, M20 8LK. Rightmove premium, Zoopla featured, OnTheMarket standard.
Property launching tomorrow: 47 Oak Road, £285k, 3-bed semi, M20. Search database for matching buyers and prepare contact list.
Generate launch email for matched buyers: 2 Riverside Court Penthouse, £475k. Luxury property. 4 matched buyers identified.
Portal upload failed for 29 Meadow Close. Error: EPC expired. Property cannot go live. Alert team and resolve.
Daily buyer matching: Search database for buyers matching 25 Manor Lane, £650k, 5-bed detached, period features, swimming pool.
Weekly portal stats request: 31 Park Road, M20 5GH. Get Rightmove views, saves, enquiries. Compare to similar properties.
HOT BUYER ALERT: BUY-2024-3021 Alexander Grant just registered. Relocating from London, £400k cash, needs 3-4 bed in M20. Match immediately.
Property has been live 21 days with low interest: 22 Maple Avenue. Review marketing strategy. Consider description refresh or feature boost.
Find investors for: 88 London Road Unit 5 (live/work), £245k. Looking for 6%+ yield buyers in database.
URGENT: Rightmove enquiry just received. Sarah Thompson asking about 47 Oak Road. FTB, mortgage approved. Respond immediately.
Viewing request logged: James Wilson wants to see 22 Maple Avenue tomorrow evening. Check vendor availability and book slot.
4 viewings scheduled tomorrow for 9 Mill Road. Prepare viewing brief, confirm with vendor, send buyer reminders.
Viewing just completed: George Hamilton at 5 Willow Walk. Very interested, asked about offer process. Cash buyer, no chain. Log feedback.
Post-viewing feedback calls due: Contact all 5 buyers who viewed 31 Park Road this week. Gather feedback for vendor report.
Daily feedback aggregation: Compile all feedback received today across all properties. Identify patterns and concerns.
Generate weekly vendor report for: 47 Oak Road. Week 2 on market. 12 viewings, 28 enquiries, 2 offers received. Full analysis required.
Feedback pattern identified: 3 buyers said 22 Maple Avenue looks dated in photos. Refresh description to emphasize 'renovation potential'.
Vendor agrees to price reduction: 19 Cedar Avenue from £268k to £250k. Update all portals and notify matched buyers.
ALERT: 5 consecutive negative feedbacks on 55 Church Lane. All mention 'dated kitchen'. Prepare vendor conversation strategy.
OFFER RECEIVED: £275,000 on 47 Oak Road from Michael Brown. Claims cash buyer, no chain. Verify financial position before presenting to vendor.
Verify chain position for buyer Sophie Turner offering on 23 Valley Drive. Claims property under offer - check status with her agent.
Present offer to vendor: £350,000 for 9 Mill Road from Dr Stewart family. Cash buyers, chain free. Prepare recommendation.
Multiple offers situation: 3 offers received on 29 Meadow Close. £190k, £192k, £195k. All investors. Prepare best and final process.
Vendor counter-offer instruction: Reject £275k on 47 Oak Road. Will accept £282k minimum. Communicate to buyer.
SALE AGREED: 47 Oak Road, £280,000. Buyer: Michael & Emma Brown. Vendor: Sarah Anderson. Initiate sale agreed workflow.
Collect solicitor details: Buyer Michael Brown on 47 Oak Road. Need firm name, contact person, email, phone for MoS.
Map full chain for: 31 Park Road sale. Buyer has dependent sale in Stockport. Need to understand full chain length.
Handover to sales progressor: 3 Primrose Path. Sale agreed at £315k. Cash buyer. Prepare comprehensive handover brief.
Send congratulations communications: Sale agreed on 14 York Avenue. Email both buyer and vendor with next steps.
Generate Memorandum of Sale: 47 Oak Road. All party details confirmed. Create and distribute to all parties.
Distribute MoS for 31 Park Road to: Buyer, Vendor, Buyer's Solicitor, Vendor's Solicitor, Mortgage Lender.
Update property status to SSTC: 42 Hawthorn Drive. Update Rightmove, Zoopla, OnTheMarket, and agency website.
MoS amendment required: Buyer's solicitor details were wrong on 11 Albert Street. Regenerate and redistribute.
Vendor request: Keep 8 Queens Drive marketing active despite SSTC. Wants backup buyers in case sale falls through.
New progression case: 47 Oak Road. Create timeline, identify milestones, set up tracking for all parties.
Weekly chase: Contract pack not yet received from vendor's solicitor on 31 Park Road. Last requested 10 days ago.
Survey issue: Down-valuation on 66 Victoria Road. Surveyor valued at £300k vs £315k agreed. Need renegotiation strategy.
Mortgage offer chase: 3 weeks since valuation on 42 Hawthorn Drive. Buyer's broker not responding. Escalate.
RED FLAG: 11 Albert Street showing fall-through risk. Buyer gone quiet, solicitor not responding. Initiate intervention.
Pre-exchange checklist: 17 Forest Road. Verify all parties ready: Deposit funds, mortgage offer, contract approval, insurance.
Coordinate exchange: All parties on 3 Primrose Path ready. Buyer wants exchange Friday, complete in 2 weeks. Confirm with chain.
EXCHANGE DAY: 17 Forest Road. Monitor solicitor communications. Confirm deposit received. Update on contract swap.
EXCHANGED: 17 Forest Road. Completion date 15th December. Update all systems, notify all parties, congratulations calls.
Exchange delayed: Buyer's solicitor on 14 York Avenue raised last-minute enquiry. Sale at risk. Need immediate resolution.
Completion tomorrow: 17 Forest Road. Final checks - funds transfer arranged, property vacant, meter readings, key collection.
COMPLETION DAY: 17 Forest Road. Monitor funds transfer. Confirm legal completion. Prepare for key release.
URGENT: Funds not received by noon on completion day for Flat 12 The Maltings. Chase buyer's solicitor immediately.
COMPLETED: 17 Forest Road. Legal completion confirmed at 2:15pm. Release keys to buyer. Trigger post-completion workflow.
Send completion congratulations: Flat 12 The Maltings completed. Welcome new owner Olivia Chapman to her first home!
Generate commission invoice: 17 Forest Road completed at £375,000. Fee 1.2% + VAT. Submit to vendor's solicitor.
Remove all marketing: 17 Forest Road completed. Take down board, remove from all portals, update website status.
Request Google review from: George & Patricia Howard (vendors 17 Forest Road) and buyer. Send personalized thank you.
Commission received: £4,500 + VAT for 17 Forest Road. Allocate team splits: 60% Tom Davies, 40% Michael Thompson.
Send handwritten thank you cards to: Vendor Sarah Anderson and Buyers Michael & Emma Brown for 47 Oak Road sale.
Update client database: Sarah Anderson now buyer. Looking for 4-bed in M21 for onward purchase. Add to buyer database.
1-year anniversary: Contact Olivia Chapman (Flat 12 The Maltings). Check satisfaction, ask about referrals.
High satisfaction client: Dr Stewart family (completed 3 months ago). Ask for referrals - they're connected in medical community.
Database reactivation: Contact leads registered 18+ months ago who never purchased. 47 leads identified for re-engagement.
Request testimonial from: Michael & Emma Brown (cash buyer, smooth transaction on 47 Oak Road). For website and marketing.
